alert.note: Alert for West Glacier Region (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 07 at 12:23PM MST until December 08 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM MST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches for valleys, with 4 to 8 inches from Essex to Marias Pass. Total snow accumulations of 7 to 14 inches in the Whitefish and Swan Ranges. * WHERE...Polebridge, Bad Rock Canyon, Essex, Highway 83 Bigfork to Swan Lake, and Marias Pass. * WHEN...Until 9 AM MST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Outdoor recreationalists should be prepared for winter conditions. Snowfall could impact roads and cold temperatures may result in hypothermia.
